question: What is the number of disaster projects starting later than 2021?
sub_query: Starting date of disaster projects after 2021
final_answer: The number of disaster projects starting later than 2021 is currently one. The "Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs" project is scheduled to begin construction in Spring 2022.
sub_answers: There are currently no disaster projects under construction at this time. In the past, the City completed a Citywide Guardrail Replacement project, which included replacing damaged guardrails caused by the Woolsey Fire. The project was finished in February 2021.

The disaster project "Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs" is scheduled to begin construction in Spring 2022. The disaster project "Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements" is currently in the design phase, with no specific start date mentioned. The project "Marie Canyon Green Streets" is anticipated to have a final design by March 2022 and will be advertised for construction bids shortly after that date.
